episodes.title: Department of Justice missing Epstein documents release deadlines
episodes.description:
The latest batch of documents related to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein were supposed to be released 25 days ago.  

President Donald Trump's former personal attorney and now Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche, is citing necessary redactions and reviews for the holdup. 

Republicans and democrats are pressing the issue, earlier this month, congressman Thomas Massie says the missing deadlines are only part of the problem. 

  #montana #montanamoment #nbcmontana #mtwx #news #national #nationalnews #release #deadline #doj #department #of #justice #politicalnews #politics #epsteinfiles #epsteinlist #miss #missing #court 

FULL STORY: https://nbcmontana.com/news/nation-world/bill-hillary-clinton-refuse-to-testify-in-house-jeffrey-epstein-files-probe-as-house-oversight-committee-chairman-james-comer-threatens-contempt-charges-justice-department

episodes.title: 'Doomsday Mom' Lori Vallow Daybell represents herself in new murder trial
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell, the Idaho woman infamously known as "The Doomsday Mom," was back in court Monday after she was sentenced to life in prison in 2023 for the murders of her two youngest children, 7-year-old J.J. Vallow and 16-year-old Tylee Ryan.

Aside from murder, Vallow Dayball was found guilty of plotting to kill her husband’s late wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as a charge of grand theft. 

#lorivallowtrial #lorivallowdaybell #daybell #daybelltrial

FULL STORY: https://nbcmontana.com/news/nation-world/doomsday-mom-lori-vallow-daybell-set-to-represent-herself-in-new-murder-trial-death-homicide-investigation-chad-jj-vallow-tylee-ryan-opening-statements-phoenix-arizona-idaho-the-national-news-desk-true-crime-criminally-obsessed#
